name: Knights of the Crate
description:
Knights Of The Crate is a "Micro Rogue-like" setting in a dungeon made of toys.
It's your goal to guide the knight through the different randomly-generated rooms to gather materials to unlock new hats and helmets as well as add new dangers to the pool.

- Wear 11 different hats or helmets to (arguably) show off your style!

- Unlock new enemy types and hazards to spice up your challenges!

- Reach Level 30 to become the a true master of the crate!

Donations help to support my main project "Aestik" <3
